evidence.claim: Etairos Health utilizes AWS and Azure for their cloud infrastructure.
The company mentions adherence to HIPAA regulations, highlighting their focus on healthcare data security.
Etairos integrates with EHR systems using FHIR and HL7 standards for interoperability.
They employ Kafka for event-driven architecture in their platform.
The integration of X12 transaction sets is part of their EDI capabilities, facilitating claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Etairos Health focuses on healthcare data exchange and X12 compliance, indicating relevant use cases.
